external_games.name: Pit Stop Racing: Club Vs. Club

name: Pit Stop Racing: Club Vs. Club
summary:
Easy! Intense!
Have fun with 'One Touch Racing'
Discard the hard control system of the existing racing game, and play the race by matching the timing.
The control system is as easy for a 3 -year-old, but the judgment is narrow and so it requires a high degree of concentration.
Win the winners in each tournament in order, and become the best racer !
